member_organisations: Regional Council of Lapland, Lapland Center of Business, Environment, and Transport, Lapland Chamber of Commerce, Rovaniemi municipality, County Administrative Board of Norrbotten, Norrbotten County Council, Association of municipalities and regions in Norrbotten, Norrbotten Chamber of Commerce, Nordland County Council, Nordland County Governor, Troms County Council, Troms County Governor, Finnmark County Council, Finnmark County Governor, Innovation Norway.
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Budget, Culture, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EU Arctic communication; Territorial Cohesion Policy 2020-2027; Smart specialization platforms
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Transnational associations and networks of public regional or other sub-national authorities
relevant_communication: Participate and contribute to the implementation of following EU programmes: National ERDF and ESF programmes in Finland and in Sweden; Interreg V A North 2014-2020 programme; Northern Periphery and Arctic 2014-2020 programme; Interreg Baltic Sea 2014-2020 programme; Nordic Council of Ministers programme for regional cross-border cooperation and urban planning 2017-2020; Nordic Council of Ministers' Arctic programme.
goals__remit: Promote and develop regional cross-border cooperation between the northernmost counties of Finland, Sweden, and Norway.
